channel.title: Need help with battlescape
channel.description: I just downloaded the client, and now when i use it it's just exactly the same as real runescape login screen, like silab's without ip and port, can anyone tell me how to fix this??

item.title: Need help with battlescape
item.dc:creator: @1337pker 1337pker
item.description:
@1337pker wrote:

[quote=“zerøgrävity, post:2, topic:162354”]Its not an open source client.

You can only connect to Battlescape’s Ip address.

Btw Pali’s Internet is down so battlescape isnt up unless he got it fixed.[/quote]

Thx, I just heard about it once from a friend and looked it up on google, so i pretty much had no idea what it was

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with battlescape
item.dc:creator: @zerogravity zerøgrävity
item.description:
@zerogravity wrote:

Its not an open source client.

You can only connect to Battlescape’s Ip address.

Btw Pali’s Internet is down so battlescape isnt up unless he got it fixed.
